I am 115# and ordered a size small. Fits great, like a petite sweater. Has a velvety feel to it.

The ruffled back on this is really pretty, a definite plus. I sized up due to others' reviews, but the Medium is too large on me (32C, slender build) so I would say order your normal US size. The Small fit me nicely. I have long arms and the sleeves are plenty long.  Note, some reviews say the back is too short and I have the opposite comment, for me it was longer in the back than looks optimal with my natural-waisted fit and flare dress.
The fabric, style, and color are beautiful! The size fitted perfectly and functional  !
The jacket ran small. Does not stretch. The color was beautiful.

评论概述: Beautiful fabric, fits well, but short in the back
评论详情: True to Size, fits well, but short in the back.  SO, I added a piece of beautiful golden metallic lace edging to the back and part of the side front, and also shortened the sleeve length to my arm length.  The golden lace is about 5 inches long that, when sewn on, added about 4 inches to backside bolero length. The lace edge drapes nicely to show off the lace shape when worn.  Four stars is only because of the shortness of the back of the bolero.
Comfortable and cute
I am very disappointed with this item. I ordered a large, based on Belle Pogue's size chart, and it does not fit well or right. I will be returning it.
